idm.userNameValidator.userNameMustHaveAtLeastXCharacters: Username must have at least {{param}} characters.
idm.userNameValidator.userNameMustStartWith: Username must start with lower case letter [a-z] or with '_'.
idm.userNameValidator.userNameMayContain: Username may contain lower case letters [a-z], digits [0-9], '_' or '-'. It may end with '$'.
idm.userNameValidator.errGroupWithThisNameExists: A group with this name already exists.

idm.passwordValidator.passwordMustBeAtLeastXLong: Password must be at least {{param}} characters long
idm.passwordValidator.passwordMustContainXLowercase: Password must contain at least {{param}} lowercase characters (a-z)
idm.passwordValidator.passwordMustContainXUppercase: Password must contain at least {{param}} uppercase characters (A-Z)
idm.passwordValidator.passwordMustContainXDigits: Password must contain at least {{param}} digits (0-9)
idm.passwordValidator.passwordMustContainXSpecial: Password must contain at least {{param}} special characters (!ยง$%&/()=? etc.)

idm.groupNameValidator.groupNameMustHaveAtLeastXCharacters: Group name must have at least {{param}} characters.
idm.groupNameValidator.groupNameMayNotExceedXCharacters: Group name may not exceed {{param}} characters.
idm.groupNameValidator.groupNameMustStartWith: Group name must start with lower case letter [a-z] or with '_'.
idm.groupNameValidator.groupNameMayContain: Group name may contain lower case letters [a-z], digits [0-9], '_' or '-'. It may end with '$'.
idm.groupNameValidator.groupNameReservedInternal: This group name is reserved for internal use.

idm.permissionDetails.fullAccess: Full access (This will grant all permissions as well as additional administrative access to the system)
